document.full_text: calvin borel, who has ridden the kentucky derby winner three of the last four years, finally picked up a mount, twice the appeal, for the derby on may 7.
document.title: sports briefing | horse racing: borel lands ride for kentucky derby
lines_and_colors: calvin borel, who has ridden the kentucky derby winner three of the last four years, finally picked up a mount, twice the appeal, for the derby on may 7.
